tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FinancialForecasting ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    date DATE, 
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10), 
    closing_price DECIMAL(10, 2), 
    volume INT 
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  market_index VARCHAR,
  closing_price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE forecasts (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  predicted_price DECIMAL,
  confidence_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_date DATE,
  trend_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE financial_metrics (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_date DATE,
  metric_name VARCHAR,
  metric_value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    market_index VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    close_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    trend_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    prediction DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    confidence_level FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE financial_forecasting (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    predicted_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    actual_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE analyst_reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    report_text TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    market_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    market_cap DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    volume FLOAT NOT NULL
)
